title: Tuareg
brief_description: A six year drought in the Sahel desert has forced the Tuareg to abandon their traditional nomadic ways. The film examines the changes in the structure and lifestyle of the Tuareg and looks at Community Aid Abroad projects which are helping them to establish a new way of life.
